comforts.networking.failed: toki ilo pi ante Comforts li pakala
item.comforts.sleeping_bag.auto_use.tool: sina leko e ni la, mi alasa lape e sina.
sina anpa lili la, sina ken leko e ona li lape ala.
item.comforts.rope_and_nail.placement.to: jan li leko e len lape kepeken ilo ni.
block.comforts.hammock.occupied: jan li kepeken len lape ni
block.comforts.sleeping_bag.occupied: jan li kepeken poki lape ni
block.comforts.hammock.too_far_away: sina ken ala lape tan ni: len lape li lon poka ala
block.comforts.sleeping_bag.too_far_away: sina ken ala lape tan ni: poki lape li lon poka ala
block.comforts.no_sleep: ni li pona lukin taso. sina ken ala lape lon ni
block.comforts.hammock.no_sleep: sina ken lape lon tenpo suno
block.comforts.hammock.no_sleep.2: sina ken lape lon tenpo suno, anu lon tenpo pimeja, anu lon tenpo pi linja suno
block.comforts.hammock.no_rope: len lape li wile lon insa ilo tu pi len lape
block.comforts.hammock.no_space: len lape li suli li ken ala lon ni
block.comforts.hammock.missing_rope: len lape li wile e ilo nanpa tu pi len lape lon jasima
capability.comforts.not_sleepy: sina ken ala lape tan ni: sina wile ala lape
gui.comforts.config.autoUse.name: leko la o alasa lape
gui.comforts.config.autoUse.description: ni la, jan li leko e poki lape la ona li alasa lape e ona.
gui.comforts.config.restrictSleeping.nam: o ken ala e lape mute lon tenpo lili
gui.comforts.config.restrictSleeping.des: ni la, jan li lape la, ona li ken ala lape lon tenpo kama lili.
gui.comforts.config.restMultiplier.name: mute pi wile lape
gui.comforts.config.restMultiplier.descr: lawa musi restrictSleeping la, nanpa ni li lawa e mute tenpo pi ken ala lape  (nanpa li mute la, tenpo li lili).
gui.comforts.config.hammockUse.name: tenpo pi len lape
gui.comforts.config.hammockUse.descripti: kipisi ni pi tenpo suno la, jan li ken lape lon len lape.
gui.comforts.config.sleepingBagUse.name: tenpo pi poki lape
gui.comforts.config.sleepingBagUse.descr: kipisi ni pi tenpo suno la, jan li ken lape lon poki lape
gui.comforts.config.sleepingBagBreakChan: jan li lape lon poki lape la, ken pi mute ni la, poki li kama pakala.
pakala pi poki lape la wawa pi ken pona
mi mute pi nanpa ni e wawa pi ken pona jan, li suli pi mute ni e nanpa sleepingBagBreakChance.
gui.comforts.config.sleepingBagEffects.d:
jan li pini lape lon poki lape la, mi pana e pilin ni tawa ona.
nasin toki: pilin;tenpo;wawa
gui.comforts.config.hammocksStopPhantoms: len lape li weka e waso mun
ni la, jan li alasa lape lon len lape la, waso mun li ken ala kama lon.
gui.comforts.config.sleepingBagsStopPhan: poki lape li weka e waso mun
ni la, jan li alasa lape lon poki lape la, waso mun li ken ala kama lon.
